title: Goaltrender For The Boston Bruins 5/28: Memorial Day, Harambe, J6, Ariana Grande, Kim Kardashian
itunes:title: Goaltrender For The Boston Bruins 5/28: Memorial Day, Harambe, J6, Ariana Grande, Kim Kardashian
description:
On this edition of the Goaltrender For The Boston Bruins Miles and Jamie Loftus discuss Memorial Day, the 5-year deathiversary of Harambe, Republican voting against “Jan. 6th” commission, Arianna Grande's marriage, and Kim Kardashian's COVID controversy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
